personalInfo.name: Yash Dedhia
personalInfo.title: Software Developer
about: I'm Yash Dedhia, a problem solver at heart and a tech enthusiast who loves building innovative digital solutions. Whether it's developing scalable applications, optimizing systems, or crafting AI-powered tools, I thrive on turning ideas into reality. My journey spans across software development, entrepreneurship, and exploring cutting-edge technologies to make a real impact.

Beyond my career, I'm an entrepreneur who founded Comed Learning, an ed-tech startup that has helped hundreds of students. But my passions don't stop at tech—I'm also an outdoor adventurer who finds joy in trekking through the wild, leading expeditions, and volunteering in wildlife conservation. Sports keep me energized, and when I'm not coding or exploring nature, you'll probably find me on the road, riding or driving toward my next adventure.
For me, solving problems isn't just a job—it's a way of life, whether in tech, business, or the great outdoors.
personalInfo.tagline: Building smart solutions, solving complex problems, and exploring the world—one challenge at a time.

education.description: Above distinction scores in key subjects including Algorithms and Analysis, Advanced Programming. Active volunteer at RMIT Student Union and RMIT Indian Club.
Held committee positions in the Entrepreneurship Cell and Student Council.

workExperience.description: Led the development of the MVP, optimizing system performance. Built scalable solutions using Vue.js, Quasar, Supabase, and PostgreSQL.
Designed and implemented RESTful APIs within a microservice architecture. Conducted data analysis to align technical outputs with business goals.
Developed an inventory management system using React.js, Node.js, and MongoDB. Trained staff for system adoption and conducted system testing for accuracy and reliability.

projects.title: Ai Browser
projects.description: Custom browser that summarizes web pages and provides AI chat with voice controls.

projects.title: Quizzer
projects.description: Quiz application allowing users to take quizzes, view history, and manage accounts.

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: A responsive portfolio website built with modern web technologies to showcase my skills and projects.

extraCurricular.description: Founded an ed-tech startup providing services to over 300 students.
Participated in multiple 2-3 day hackathons, including runner-up at Monash University and second runner-up at RMIT University.
Volunteered with India's largest urban wildlife conservation organization.
Organized and led 10+ treks across the Himalayan ranges.
